Item:
<:monster:1199952229826830437>  You encountered a Gloom Hands! This foe is especially tough...Multiple people can fight this monster! <:monster:1199952229826830437> 
```
- Please only roll **ONE CHARACTER**  per battle in order to give other members a chance to roll. 
- Wait for others to roll, do not roll multiple times in a row. You may roll again only after no one else has rolled for for 2 or more minutes.
- Please only use characters in the village the monster appear in!
- Characters can heal during battle! They do not need to wait for a mod to approve the healing, it can be done in the channel the battle is happening in
- Members must keep track of the monster hearts! After each person rolls, that person is responsible for posting the remaining hearts. No one else is allowed to roll until this is done. 

**Gloom Hands**

```/tableroll gloomhands```
